column4: i changed the nameservers, my /etc/resolv.conf show the new nameserver, but lookups still take a million years
Well, I guess it's not the DNS servers then.
Can you give a pastebin of resolv.conf and any files in /etc/resolvconf?
incidentally, my broweser is trying to lookup paste.ubuntu.com still
haha, I didn't think about that...
Add "91.189.90.174 paste.ubuntu.com" to /etc/hosts and you should be able to resolve it quickly
i disabled ipv6 b4 coming here, but that didnt really show any significant change, although i can try doing it again now
i am sure that my modem supports ipv6
thnx man, i gotta go now, u come around this channel a lot?
can i catch you around here?
